Uses of Package
net.threescale.api.v2

  • Packages that use net.threescale.api.v2 
    Package Description
    net.threescale.api
    This API is used to encapsulate the communication with the 3scale backend server for validating and reporting transactions between the user and the provider of a service.
    net.threescale.api.cache  
    net.threescale.api.servlet.filter  
    net.threescale.api.v2
    This is the version2 API for the 3scale backend.
  • Classes in net.threescale.api.v2 used by net.threescale.api 
    Class and Description
    Api2
    Version 2 of the 3Scale API.
    HttpSender
    Interface used to send Http Requests to the server.
  • Classes in net.threescale.api.v2 used by net.threescale.api.cache 
    Class and Description
    ApiException
    Encapsulate Api Exceptions
    ApiTransaction
    Data to be sent for the server for a transaction
    AuthorizeResponse
    Response from server containing current statistics.

    Interface used to send Http Requests to the server.
